name: MEC Sofia Sunglasses - Women's
description: With classic lines and a hint of a cat-eye, the Sofia sunnies nod to Old Hollywood glamour. Lounge poolside, sip rosé on your favourite patio, or add a touch of effortless style to your weekend bike ride to the farmer's market. Whatever you choose to do, know that your eyes are protected from UV rays.Deep lenses block harsh UV.Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses.6-base curvature helps block light coming in at angles.
